mapper.select: SELECT inbound_time, AVG(goods_unit_price) avg_price FROM purchase_contract WHERE goods_name=#{goodsName} and inbound_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY inbound_time ORDER BY inbound_time

SELECT sale_contract_time, AVG(goods_unit_price) avg_price FROM sale_contract WHERE goods_name=#{goodsName} and sale_contract_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY sale_contract_time ORDER BY sale_contract_time
